headline: Rocket acquires Mr. Cooper, Musk’s xAI acquires X: Morning Buzz
summary: The major averages were mostly lower near noon, with the Dow up fractionally but the Nasdaq down nearly 250 points amid mounting concerns about President Donald Trump’s upcoming announcement of promised new tariffs. Meanwhile, the S&P 500’s early losses brought the index to its lowest level since September. Looking to commodities, gold prices are sharply higher, continuing their rally to over $3,150, while oil prices are also up over 2.5%. Get caught up quickly on the top news and calls moving s

headline: EQT and KKR lead funding round that values AI company at $3.4 billion
summary: Private equity firm EQT, through its Growth fund, along with KKR and FTV Capital, has led a funding round in AI security company Reliaquest. In the round, Reliaquest raised more than $500 million. The...
